body: Bell after being broken seeing his Goddess raped and ravaged by the orcs, was thrown out onto the streets. He didn’t want to give up on life already so he worked hard for himself selling fruits and getting good gear, he fought in the dungeons effortlessly until eventually becoming the greatest swordsman in history to ever live, in the process slaughtered every bandit and orc he found driving the orcs into inevitable extinction. As for Hestia, when she tried to suck up to Bell after decades from seeing each other, Bell was no longer a boy he was now a man. He considered giving her a second chance but won’t be able to bear the thought of being betrayed again. When he died he himself became a God.
Well bell atleast you got other girls than that one.
